Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Pleasley, Derbyshire 1st annual contest promoted by Pleasley Colliery Band Restricted to bands which had not won over £5 in 1895/1896 11 bands competed Prizes: £5, £3, £1 10s Cornet medal: E. Trout (Woodhouse)
April 29, 2012, 1:30 p.m. June 27, 2019, 9:05 a.m.
